tweets.author: ぱペコ＠3D販売
tweets.text:
─── ✦ Work Report ✦ ───

This time, I was in charge of the 3D production for the ReGLOSS 1st Live Flashpoint costumes!

▼ Archive is here
https://spwn.jp/events/evt_25121601-jpregloss1st…

© COVER
#ReGLOSS #ReGLOSS_1stLive #hololive

thread_replies.author: CoreWeave
thread_replies.text: The next wave of AI innovation will be defined by purpose-built AI cloud, not one-size-fits-all general-purpose cloud hyperscalers. CoreWeave gives you the speed, scale, and partnership to go further, faster.

thread_replies.author: よー清水YoShimizu
thread_replies.text:
【Announcement】  
I was in charge of the illustrations within the live footage for ReGLOSS 1st Live “Flashpoint” held today.  

It was so much fun to draw all of ReGLOSS enjoying their holiday!  

#ReGLOSS_1stLive

ひとみゃん
thread_replies.text:
ReGLOSS 1st Live "Flashpoint"にてお披露目されました新衣装のデザインを夜光さん（@yako_mashiro ）と担当させて頂きました！
初ライブとても素敵で感動しました……
これからのご活躍も楽しみにしております！
#ReGLOSS #ReGLOSS_1stLive

thread_replies.author: Cloudinary
thread_replies.text:
Is your creative pipeline slowing down product launches?
Mint Velvet cut bulk upload time from 30 minutes to just 5, and image delivery from 15 minutes to instant—all with Cloudinary. Want to see how fast you could go?
